pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thermoluminescence Glow Curve Deconvolution // Deconvolving first-order thermoluminescence glow curves using a modified Levenberg-Marquardt algorithm. It provides the possibility of setting constraints or fixing any of parameters. It offers an interactive way to initialize parameters by clicking with a mouse on a plot at positions where peak maxima should be located. Glow peaks can be simulated according to the Randall- Wilkins model.
